sentences.sContent: It was highly irresponsible of him to leave the children on their own in the pool.
sentences.sCn: 他把孩子们独自留在游泳池里，真是太不负责任了。

words.tran: 不可抵抗的；不能压制的；极为诱人的

trans.tranCn: 不对更高一级负责的；不承担责任的；无责任感的；无负责能力的
trans.tranOther: doing careless things without thinking or worrying about the possible bad results

trans.tranCn: 不负责任的人， 无责任感的人
